did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Inventory of the Stephen B. Porter Archive of Wesleyan Student Music1983 - 1987
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: Recordings made by Stephen B. Porter '87 of student music performed on the Wesleyan campus. Some recordings made with the assistance of Dana E. Walcott '86, who provided assistance with documention of the collection.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The original audiocassettes must be digitized to provide listening copies. Contact staff for more information.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stephen B. Porter Archive of Wesleyan Student Music, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Stephen B. Porter '87. Collection documented with the assistance of Dana E. Walcott '86.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Stephen B. Porter Archive of Wesleyan Student Music consists of recordings made by Stephen B. Porter '87 of student music performed at various locations on the Wesleyan University campus, 1983-1987. The recordings are on audiocassettes. Some of the tapes were recorded with the assistance of Dana E Walcott, '86, who provided assistance with documention of the collection. This collection is dedicated to Andrew Stollman, Class of 1987, "in honor of the gifts he gave to all of us."
All recordings were made with the consent and cooperation of the performers.
Audience masters were recorded in stereo with a pair of Sennheiser ME-80 shotgun microphones and a Sony D5 portable tape deck.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.subject: Students' music.
Music in universities and colleges.
